name: Muhammed Sayees
headline: A passionate BCA student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
bio: I'm Muhammed Sayees, a dedicated BCA student at Yenepoya University with a strong interest in artificial intelligence, data science, and innovative digital solutions. I enjoy building startups, web apps, and experimenting with trading algorithms. With an entrepreneurial mindset and technical skills, I aim to make a meaningful impact in tech-driven domains.

achievements: Launched a portfolio website using Next.js
Developed a student complaint registration portal

projects.name: Exquio
projects.description: An AI-based doctor appointment booking system using React Native and Supabase.

projects.name: Roamio
projects.description: A tour guide application offering details about rooms, transport, and guides.

projects.name: Student Complaint Portal
projects.description: A web-based complaint box for students to submit concerns directly to college authorities.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio built using Next.js with modern UI/UX and animations.

experience.description: Working on real-world web and mobile applications using modern frameworks and tools.
